summary: The customer contacted Contoso Wireless regarding their upgrade services, as they were expecting to receive product streaming but were unable to access it. The customer service agent looked into the issue and determined that the product streaming service was not included in the upgrade package. The agent then provided the customer with information about a separate product streaming package that includes video streaming services for $19.99 per month. The customer agreed to add the package to their account and thanked the agent for their help.
